body_html: It's better to specify a particular tag for the image rather than rely on :latest being what you want. Can you try Dockerfile above? If you want to build pytorch interactively within container, you can just run the RUN commands inside container.

body: It's better to specify a particular tag for the image rather than rely on :latest being what you want. Can you try Dockerfile above? If you want to build pytorch interactively within container, you can just run the RUN commands inside container.
